title: Weirdest Unboxing Ever: Owlchemy Labs' Cosmonious High
description:
Owlchemy Labs promised us the craziest mailer of all time, and boy, did they deliver in this sponsored video for the announcement of their new VR game Cosmonious High. Come for the humongous box, stay for the new trailer!
